ModMetaData.name: [1.1][1.0] UN-Colony Addon
ModMetaData.author: FantasyFan
ModMetaData.description:
This Mod is an addon to the UN-Colony Mod by Sadjuuk and updated by Mlie. The preview is made of graphics from Sadjuuk`s Mod.
The buildings now use resources from UN-Colony.
Patches: -Core -Dubs Bad Hygiene -Rimefeller -Rimatomics -Genetic Rim -Saves our Ship -Vanilla Furniture Expanded (Core, Spacer, Security, Production, Farming and Medical)
UN-Colony (Continued) is needed. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019774245
Can be safely added/removed from existing saves.
If you find things unbalanced, please make suggestions for improvement.
